commands.name: configure-spaces
commands.title: Configure Spaces
commands.subtitle: Configure your spaces first to name them
commands.description: Configure and name your desktop spaces

commands.name: switch-space
commands.title: Switch Space
commands.subtitle: Switch configured space
commands.description: Switch to a configured desktop space

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
